fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Before starting the game, the host creates 3 new roles and you get to choose one of them to use the abilities of.
- Whenever someone is hanged, you can't copy your current role's abilities anymore and must choose a new role that the host created to copy.
- If there are no more roles for you to use the abilities of, the host creates 5 new roles and the cycle repeats.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only use one ability per night.
